Articles.Content:
Okay, excuse me if this isn't the right place to be posting bug reports. Please move it to the appropriate forum if so.

Alright, so the SRB exhaust plumes have been enormous since I updated to 0.25. This has got to be a bug, as they're now far out of proportion to the exhaust coming out of liquid fuel motors.
That's not a bug, that's new FX. And it's actually accurate that SRBs has more "fiery" exhaust than LFEs. To illustrate, Soyuz and Shuttle:

That's not a bug, that's new FX. And it's actually accurate that SRBs has more "fiery" exhaust than LFEs. To illustrate, Soyuz and Shuttle:

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Soyuz_TMA-9_launch.jpg/510px-Soyuz_TMA-9_launch.jpghttp://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d6/STS120LaunchHiRes-edit1.jpg/490px-STS120LaunchHiRes-edit1.jpg

Was just watching an Ariane 5 launch video and it seems that you're right.
